name: Brick & Block: 5 in 1
description:
Brick & Block is the collection of the best arcade games from the most popular console of the 90s - Brick Games. Are you tired of complicated and obscure games? Did you miss the favorite classic games? Try it at least once, to remember how great it was!

Now, these retro arcade games are available for free on your phones and tablets. Original sound, easy-to-use controls, various skins for devices, a full set of games, and no built-in payments and purchases. Play the classic snake, racing, shooter and ping pong games.

Play and achieve the best scores, compete with friends and acquaintances. And if you are missing some arcade games, or if you have noticed any incorrectness of the controls, please, inform us about it in the comments section and we will try to accommodate your wishes in the next update.


Game features:

• Classic interface
• Original sound setting
• Leaderboard for each game
